DOC.brief_summary: The pneumoperitoneum laparoscopic surgery potential cause increase intracranial pressure ( ICP ) . Previous study propose ultrasonographic measurement optic nerve sheath diameter ( ONSD ) correlate sign increase ICP . The aim study compare effect pnemoperitoneum intracranial pressure cerebral oxygenation laparoscopic surgery accord anesthesia agent , propofol base total intravenous anesthesia ( TIVA group ) desflurane anesthesia ( Des group ) .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Pnemoperitoneum Intracranial Pressure Cerebral Oxygenation During Laparoscopic Surgery According Anesthesia Agents : Propofol Based Total Intravenous Anesthesia v Desflurane Anesthesia
DOC.criteria: Adult patient ( 2080 year age ) schedule laparoscopic cholecystectomy undergo general anesthesia Patients previous history neurologic disease , carotid disease , transient ischemic attack , ocular disease ocular surgery
